Label.text: Njord's Hearth is an unusually warm, forested domain in the north, near the lands of Icewrack. Despite its cold surroundings, the domain experiences eternal spring.

An unknown Force has infested the trees allowing the corruption of the forest. The Frost is advancing from the North and the Dire from the South. Large parts of the Forest are already frozen or corrupted.
The only chance to restore the forest is the elder tree in the center of the forest. It must be defend it at all cost.
